summary: RECARO PERFORMANCE RIDE - VIBE  333.01.VIBE  SERIAL NUMBER 500492389  MANUFACTURE DATE 08/08/2013  EXPIRES SIX YEARS AFTER MANUFACTURED  THIS IS A FIVE POINT HARNESS CAR SEAT THAT STARTS AT 5LBS TO APPROXIMATELY FOR A 10 YEAR OLD.
